00012 // TODO: This file, lamely, duplicates a lot of what is in jcom.hub.internals.cpp.
00013 //                      Should create a more DRY way of doing this.
00014 
00015 
00016 class uiInternalObject {
00017         public:
00018         t_object        *theObject;
00019         //method                action;
00020         
00021         uiInternalObject(char *classname, char *subscribername, char *subscribertype, char *ramptype, char *description)
00022         {
00023                 t_atom          a[7];
00024         
00025                 theObject = NULL;
00026                 atom_setsym(a+0, gensym(subscribername));
00027                 atom_setsym(a+1, gensym("@type"));
00028                 atom_setsym(a+2, gensym(subscribertype));
00029                 atom_setsym(a+3, gensym("@ramp/drive"));
00030                 atom_setsym(a+4, gensym(ramptype));
00031                 atom_setsym(a+5, gensym("@description"));
00032                 atom_setsym(a+6, gensym(description));
00033                 jcom_core_loadextern(gensym(classname), 7, a, &theObject);
00034         }
00035         
00036         ~uiInternalObject()
00037         {
00038                 object_free(theObject);
00039         }
00040         
00041         void setAction(method aCallback, t_object *aCallbackArg)
00042         {
00043                 object_method(theObject, gensym("setcallback"), aCallback, aCallbackArg);
00044         }
00045 };
00046 
00047 
00048 void ui_internals_destroy(t_ui *obj)
00049 {
00050         long                            i;
00051         long                            numKeys = 0;
00052         t_symbol                        **keys = NULL;
00053         uiInternalObject        *anObject;
00054         t_max_err                       err;
00055         
00056         hashtab_getkeys(obj->hash_internals, &numKeys, &keys);
00057         for(i=0; i<numKeys; i++){
00058                 err = hashtab_lookup(obj->hash_internals, keys[i], (t_object**)&anObject);
00059                 if(!err)
00060                         delete anObject;
00061         }
00062         
00063         if(keys)
00064                 sysmem_freeptr(keys);
00065                 
00066         hashtab_chuck(obj->hash_internals);
00067 }

00077 void ui_mute(t_ui *obj, t_symbol *msg, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00078 {
00079         object_attr_setvalueof(obj, gensym("is_muted"), argc, argv);
00080 }

00082 
00083 void ui_bypass(t_ui *obj, t_symbol *msg, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00084 {
00085         obj->attr_isbypassed = atom_getlong(argv);
00086         jbox_redraw(&obj->box);
00087 }

00117 
00118 t_max_err attr_set_mute(t_ui *obj, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00119 {
00120         uiInternalObject        *anObject = NULL;
00121         long                            value = atom_getlong(argv);
00122         t_max_err                       err = MAX_ERR_NONE;
00123 
00124         if(obj->attr_ismuted != value){
00125                 obj->attr_ismuted = value;
00126                 err = hashtab_lookup(obj->hash_internals, gensym("mute"), (t_object**)&anObject);
00127                 if(!err)
00128                         object_method(anObject->theObject, _sym_int, obj->attr_ismuted);
00129         }
00130         return err;
00131 }

00218 
00219 t_max_err attr_set_hasmute(t_ui *obj, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00220 {
00221         uiInternalObject        *anObject;
00222         t_max_err                       err = MAX_ERR_NONE;
00223 
00224         obj->attr_hasmute = atom_getlong(argv);
00225         
00226         if(obj->attr_hasmute){
00227                 anObject = new uiInternalObject("jcom.parameter", "audio/mute", "msg_toggle", "none", "Needs to be documented -- look at Jamoma 0.4 for the information.");
00228                 anObject->setAction((method)ui_mute, (t_object*)obj);
00229                 hashtab_store(obj->hash_internals, gensym("mute"), (t_object*)anObject);
00230         }
00231         else{
00232                 err = hashtab_lookup(obj->hash_internals, gensym("mute"), (t_object**)&anObject);
00233                 if(!err){
00234 // FIXME: neeeds to remove from the hashtab!
00235                         delete anObject;
00236                 }
00237         }
00238         return err;
00239 }
